mapper.select: SELECT MDPD_CPERMISSIONID, MDPD_NSEQ, MDPD_CANDOR, MDPD_COPENEDPARENTHSIS, MDPD_CTABLEID, MDPD_CCOLUMNID, MDPD_CCOLUMNNAME, MDPD_CTYPEOFCOLUMN, MDPD_COPERATOR, MDPD_CVALUE, MDPD_CMYFLAG, MDPD_CCLOSEDPARENTHSIS, MDPD_CCOMPANYID, ( SELECT MD_CMASTERTBLNAME FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY WHERE MD_CCOLUMNNAME = MDPD_CCOLUMNID AND MD_CTABLENAME = MDPD_CTABLEID ) AS MD_CMASTERTBLNAME FROM MAST_DATAPERMISSIONDEFS, MAST_DATAPERMISSION WHERE MDPD_CPERMISSIONID = MDP_CPERMISSIONID ORDER BY MDPD_CPERMISSIONID, MDPD_NSEQ;

-- 下位データを持たない「法人のみ」定義データ SELECT MDSP_CPERMISSIONID, MDSP_CTYPEID, MDSP_CCOMPANYID, MDSP_CSECTIONID, MDSP_CPOSTID, MDSP_CEMPLOYEEID FROM MAST_DATASECTIONPOSTMAPPING MDS, MAST_DATAPERMISSION MDP WHERE MDSP_CPERMISSIONID = MDP_CPERMISSIONID AND MDSP_CTYPEID = '01' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MAST_DATASECTIONPOSTMAPPING WHERE MDSP_CPERMISSIONID = MDS.MDSP_CPERMISSIONID AND MDSP_CCOMPANYID = MDS.MDSP_CCOMPANYID AND MDSP_CTYPEID IN ('02', '03', '04', '05', '06', '07') ) -- 下位データを持たない「法人＆組織のみ」定義データ UNION SELECT MDSP_CPERMISSIONID, MDSP_CTYPEID, MDSP_CCOMPANYID, MDSP_CSECTIONID, MDSP_CPOSTID, MDSP_CEMPLOYEEID FROM MAST_DATASECTIONPOSTMAPPING MDS, MAST_DATAPERMISSION MDP WHERE MDSP_CPERMISSIONID = MDP_CPERMISSIONID AND MDSP_CTYPEID = '02' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MAST_DATASECTIONPOSTMAPPING WHERE MDSP_CPERMISSIONID = MDS.MDSP_CPERMISSIONID AND MDSP_CCOMPANYID = MDS.MDSP_CCOMPANYID AND MDSP_CSECTIONID = MDS.MDSP_CSECTIONID AND MDSP_CTYPEID IN ('03', '04') ) UNION -- その他の定義データ SELECT MDSP_CPERMISSIONID, MDSP_CTYPEID, MDSP_CCOMPANYID, MDSP_CSECTIONID, MDSP_CPOSTID, MDSP_CEMPLOYEEID FROM MAST_DATASECTIONPOSTMAPPING MDS, MAST_DATAPERMISSION MDP WHERE MDSP_CPERMISSIONID = MDP_CPERMISSIONID AND MDSP_CTYPEID IN ('03', '04', '05', '06', '07') ORDER BY MDSP_CPERMISSIONID, MDSP_CTYPEID, MDSP_CCOMPANYID, MDSP_CSECTIONID;
